name: Eight Winds
description:
Master your sword, master your body, master your own mind to overcome your opponents. Master your own limits and surpass them.

Multiplayer - Online Required

Battle opponents in head to head combat to prove who is truly the master. The move set is limited, but your mind is not. Lightning paced action, one bad move could spell your doom.

Play Locally

Play locally to improve your mastery without interference

Obstacle Mode

Destroy all the targets as quickly as possible to test your limits

More will be seen in the future!
